name: Magnamon_X
description: Magnamon X is an enhanced version of Magnamon and retains much of the same shape only with enhanced armor. The armor itself is sharper and more elaborate than the base form, with the addition of As'ma Green at the helmet, shoulders, hands, knees, and loin-guard. Its loin-guard no longer features the emblem on the Digi-Egg of Miracles .
